title: The World of Deities - Novel Updates
tags: Age Regression   Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Demons   Dragons   Elemental Magic   Evil Gods   Evil Religions   Goddesses   Gods   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hidden Abilities   Legends   Magic   Male Protagonist   Mythical Beasts   Mythology   Sword And Magic   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong   Werebeasts
author: Fire Of Eternity   永恒之火
description:
At the center of the world, on Mount Olympus, the King of Gods, Zeus, smiled and looked down on the realms with his Spear of Lightning tightly in his hand. Before him were a pantheon of deities.

At the Silver Hall in the north, Odin overlooked the world on his Almighty Throne, with Gungnir in hand. In his eyes were an endless field of wind and snow.

On the Nile River in the south, Amon who was at the helm of his sun boat cast his eyes toward the Aegean Seas, at his feet were a mountain of bones.

In the land of the two rivers, Marduk, the Lord of Light and Wisdom, held the eternal fire and gazed upon the Western Lands. King Gilgamesh, his hero, brought to Greece his oracle, and his ships covered the seas as far as the eyes could see.

Finally, at Plato Academy, a youngster named Su Ye walked up a mountain and reached its summit.>
